name: Triangle Void
description:
How far do you think you could get in Triangle Void? Download now to shoot enemies, get skins, and have fun!

Features: 

  • Shoot enemies 
  • Collect coins 
  • Get power-ups 
  • Find hearts to gain health 
  • Buy different skins for your triangle

Controls: 

  • Use the joystick to move around
  •  Tap anywhere to shoot

Website for the game: https://www.getezgames.com/triangle-void
